description: Returns information about the specified resources. For more information, see Discovering resources in the Amazon Web Services Cloud Control API User Guide. You can use this action to return information about existing resources in your account and Amazon Web Services Region, whether those resources were provisioned using Cloud Control API.

parameters.name: TypeName
parameters.description: The name of the resource type.

parameters.name: RoleArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Identity and Access Management (IAM) role for Cloud Control API to use when performing this resource operation. The role specified must have the permissions required for this operation. The necessary permissions for each event handler are defined in the handlers section of the resource type definition schema. If you do not specify a role, Cloud Control API uses a temporary session created using your Amazon Web Services user credentials. For more information, see Specifying credentials in the Amazon Web Services Cloud Control API User Guide.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource type.

nested_items.name: ResourceDescriptions
nested_items.description: Information about the specified resources, including primary identifier and resource model.

nested_items.name: Identifier
nested_items.description: The primary identifier for the resource.

nested_items.name: Properties
nested_items.description: A list of the resource properties and their current values.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the request doesn't return all of the remaining results, NextToken is set to a token. To retrieve the next set of results, call ListResources again and assign that token to the request object's NextToken parameter. If the request returns all results, NextToken is set to null.
